title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go       El Camino Real de los Tejas Interactive Map!    Here's a fun, exciting way to find places to visit. Zoom in to find a location in Texas or Louisiana. Click on the yellow balloon of your choice to see the site name, address, access, and website. Be sure to go to individual states listed in the left-hand navigation under Places to Go for more in-depth information. Note: Not all sites have images (yet).             There are many places of history and commemoration on El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail for you to visit. Discover museums, interpretive centers, and historic sites that provide information and interpretation. Please contact each site before you go to obtain current information on closures, changes in hours, and fees. Louisiana Texas
